name: MultiMino
description:
MultiMino is a Tetris-like game that tries to extend the Guideline to Pentominos, Hexominos and even the Trominos, Domino and Monomino!

The game counts with different kinds of modes for you to try:

  • Marathon: Clear a line goal of 150, 200, 300 or even an endless game
  • Sprint: How fast can you complete 40 lines?
  • Ultra: You have 3 minutes to obtain as many points as you can!
  • Survival: Be aware of the incoming garbage on your board.
  • Spin Clear: A unique mode of this game, use your knowledge about the mechanics to twist the pieces into places they normally can't to make an All Clear! How many boards can you complete?
  • Master: Show how good you are and complete this challenge at max speed!
  • Combo: You have one minute to make the longest combo on a 20x4 board.
  • CPU Versus: Test your skill and try to beat this simple AI on combat.
  • Sandbox: Want to play around with the new pieces or try setups? No problem! You can even save your boards to check them later.
  • And a especial Secret Mode, can you find it?

Customize the movement and look of your pieces as you like and save your games to watch them later on the Replays menu.

This project came to life thanks to the help of a lot of people that I'm really grateful for their contribution.
